hero.title: Welcome to Teal Ducks
hero.subtitle: Indie Game Studio
hero.description: We create fun and engaging mobile games

memoryDash.title: Memory Dash
memoryDash.description: Test your memory with this fast-paced arcade game. Match cards, beat your high score, and challenge your friends!

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We work to make a difference in the mobile gaming world
about.description1: Teal Ducks is an indie game studio that started with a passion for game development. Our goal is to provide quality and fun mobile gaming experiences to players.
about.description2: By publishing our games on the Google Play platform, we aim to offer unique experiences to players. In each of our games, we prioritize player experience and strive to deliver innovative mechanics and impressive designs.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide unforgettable experiences to players and bring innovative ideas to the mobile gaming world.

community.title: Community
community.description: We listen to our players' feedback and continuously improve our games.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We create unique game mechanics and experiences using the latest technologies.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: Our passion for game development is reflected in every project and drives us forward.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us
contact.description: We'd love to hear your feedback about our games or discuss collaboration opportunities.

form.name: Your Name
form.successMessage: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.errorMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again.
